The first step of my journey

14-03-2024

So here it is, my first blog post!

Introduction

Hi and welcome you to my personal blog!

The idea of starting this project has been in my mind for a few weeks now, until finally I decided to do something about it. With the tools available today like Astro, Github, a headless CMS and Cloudfare, it didn’t take long; a few hours during a sleepless night and tada! here it is. I tried to keep it minimal but functional while still somewhat cozy and appealing… I really like the end result tbh.

The footer is giving me nightmares, but oh well… This blog is about the learning journey I’m starting, so consider it a funny easter-egg until I can figure what to do with it.



The first leg of my journey

If you have read my Home page or my About page, you would know that -while I’m not new to coding- I consider myself an amateur. I have a some paid projects in my back, and experience with popular frameworks and libraries in the Frontend Web and Mobile development sphere; I’m also an Undergraduate Computer Science developer who is currently working towards his BS in CS… But hey, besides how harsh is to get a job nowadays, I know that I can be better and that’s why this blog was born.

So now, where do I start? Well, I don’t have a full roadmap yet and there are tons of resources out there, so I don’t know how or when it’ll end; but I know something… Roadmap sounds like a good place to start, I’ll be hitting the basics and make my way to the top (or so I hope).
